Plot: For a group of teens, the answer to the mysterious death of their old friend lies within the world of an online video game based on the true story of an ancient noblewoman known as the Blood Countess.
Title: Stay Alive
Actors: Jon Foster, Samaire Armstrong, Frankie Muniz, Jimmi Simpson
tomatoConsensus: A by-the-numbers teen horror flick, Stay Alive fails to exploit its premise for any real scares.
